trustfund:
TF028065-CANADIAN CONSLT. COOP. PROGRAM,TF020810-GERMAN CONSULTANTS TRUST FUND,TF020765-CANADIAN 'GENERAL'

            ADJ. PROG.

abstracts.cdata!:
This program consists of sectoral reform
            measures, concentrated on the cotton and cereals subsectors
            and on selected institutional reforms and natural resource
            management measures.  It would also support investments in
            the southern zone of Mali.  The sectoral adjustment and
            investment components are directly linked through the cotton
            and cereals reform program.
